Reference

Initialize

Initialize an ondisc_matrix, metadata_ondisc_matrix, or multimodal_ondisc_matrix.

Create an ondisc_matrix from a .mtx file.

create_ondisc_matrix_from_R_matrix()

Create an ondisc matrix from an R matrix

ondisc_matrix-class

ondisc_matrix class

multimodal_ondisc_matrix() multimodal_ondisc_matrix()

multimodal_ondisc_matrix class

Subset

Subset an ondisc_matrix or metadata_ondisc_matrix by feature or cell; subset a multimodal_ondisc_matrix by cell.

`[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<ANY>)

Subset using the [ operator.

Pull a submatrix into memory

Pull a submatrix of an ondisc_matrix into memory.

`[[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>) `[[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>) `[[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>) `[[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>) `[[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>) `[[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>) `[[`(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>)

Pull a submatrix into memory using the [[ operator.

Obtain basic information

Obtain basic information from an ondisc_matrix, metadata_ondisc_matrix, or multimodal_ondisc_matrix.

dim(<ondisc_matrix>) dim(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>) dim(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>) ncol() nrow()

Get dimension

head(<ondisc_matrix>)

head
